amazon: Amazon is a global e-commerce platform offering a wide range of products.
alibaba: Alibaba is a Chinese e-commerce giant providing online retail and wholesale services.
jd: JD.com (Jingdong) is a Chinese online retailer specializing in electronics and general merchandise.
taobao: Taobao is a Chinese online shopping platform owned by Alibaba Group.
meituan: Meituan is a Chinese platform focused on food delivery and lifestyle services.
didi: Didi is a Chinese ride-hailing and transportation service provider.
eleme: Eleme is a Chinese food delivery platform owned by Alibaba Group.
pinduoduo: Pinduoduo is a Chinese e-commerce platform offering group buying deals.
wechat: WeChat (Weixin) is a Chinese social media and payment app developed by Tencent.
alipay: Alipay is a mobile and online payment platform developed by Ant Group.
xiaomi: Xiaomi is a Chinese electronics company known for smartphones and smart devices.
huawei: Huawei is a Chinese technology company specializing in telecommunications equipment and smartphones.
apple: Apple is an American technology company known for iPhones, iPads, and Mac computers.
microsoft: Microsoft is an American multinational technology corporation producing software and electronics.
starbucks: Starbucks is an American coffeehouse chain known for coffee and beverages.
kfc: KFC (Kentucky Fried Chicken) is an American fast-food restaurant chain specializing in fried chicken.
nike: Nike is an American multinational corporation engaged in the design and manufacturing of footwear and apparel.
adidas: Adidas is a German multinational company designing and manufacturing shoes, clothing, and accessories.
uniqlo: Uniqlo is a Japanese casual wear designer, manufacturer, and retailer.
zara: Zara is a Spanish apparel retailer specializing in fast fashion.
didichuxing: Didi Chuxing is a major Chinese ride-hailing service company.
meituan: Meituan is a leading Chinese platform for food delivery, hotel booking, and other services.
eleme: Eleme is a major food delivery service platform in China.
jd: JD.com (Jingdong) is one of China's largest online retailers.
taobao: Taobao is a popular Chinese online shopping platform owned by Alibaba.
pinduoduo: Pinduoduo is a Chinese online platform specializing in social group buying deals.
alipay: Alipay is a leading Chinese digital payment platform operated by Ant Group.
wechatpay: WeChat Pay is a digital wallet service integrated into WeChat.
xiaomi: Xiaomi is a Chinese electronics brand offering smartphones and smart home devices.
huawei: Huawei is a Chinese multinational technology company providing telecom equipment and smartphones.
